key.name: refresh-rate
key.description: The rate at which the screen is redrawn (times/second) (1 - 200)

key.name: unredirect-fullscreen-windows
key.description: Allow drawing of fullscreen windows to not be redirected to offscreen pixmaps

key.name: unredirect-match
key.description: Specifies which windows will be unredirected when they are fullscreen. You might want to exclude video players for example, to avoid tearing. But this will be at the expense of performance/frame rate. Note: "class=" matching requires the regex plugin to work. (match)

key.name: force-independent-output-painting
key.description: Paint each output device independly, even if the output devices overlap
